text: The Mesa Solar Sox are a baseball team that plays in the East Division of the Arizona Fall League. They play their home games in Mesa, Arizona at Sloan Park, which is also the spring training facility of the Chicago Cubs. ==Notable alumni== *Kris Bryant, third base for the Chicago Cubs *Drew Carpenter, former pitcher for the Toronto Blue Jays *Jermaine Dye, former outfielder for the Oakland Athletics and Chicago White Sox *Sam Fuld, outfielder for the Oakland Athletics *L.J. Hoes, outfielder for the Houston Astros *Ryan Kalish, former outfielder for the Boston Red Sox *Paul Konerko, former first baseman and designated hitter for the Chicago White Sox *Derrek Lee, former first baseman for the Chicago Cubs, and Baltimore Orioles *Joc Pederson, outfielder for the Los Angeles Dodgers *Mike Piazza, MLB Hall of Famer and former catcher for the New York Mets, and Los Angeles Dodgers *Cody Ross, former outfielder for the Arizona Diamondbacks *Josh Satin, second baseman for the Cincinnati Reds *Kyle Schwarber, outfielder for the Chicago Cubs *Josh Zeid, pitcher for the Houston Astros ==Roster== ==References== *"HoHoKam Park."
